name: Albedo
title: Kreideprinz
description: A genius known as the Kreideprinz, he is the Chief Alchemist and Captain of the Investigation Team of the Knights of Favonius.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Favonius Bladework - Weiss
skills.description:
Normal Attack
Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.

Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma
skills.description:
Albedo creates a Solar Isotoma using alchemy, which deals AoE Geo DMG on appearance.

Solar Isotoma
has the following properties:
·When opponents within the Solar Isotoma field take DMG, the Solar Isotoma will generate Transient Blossoms which deal AoE Geo DMG. DMG dealt scales off Albedo's DEF.
·Transient Blossoms can only be generated once every 2s.
·When a character is located at the locus of the Solar Isotoma, the Solar Isotoma will accumulate Geo power to form a crystallized platform that lifts the character up to a certain height. Only one crystallized platform can exist at a time.
·Solar Isotoma is considered a Geo construct. Only one Solar Isotoma created by Albedo himself can exist at a time.

Hold to designate the location of the skill.
skills.info: This Geo bloom has an unusual property mirrored in the aim of alchemy. To rise from the earth, soar into the sky, and become the sun.

skills.name: Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide
skills.description:
Under Albedo's command, Geo crystals surge and burst forth, dealing AoE Geo DMG in front of him.
If a Solar Isotoma created by Albedo himself is on the field, 7 Fatal Blossoms will be generated in the Solar Isotoma field, bursting violently into bloom and dealing AoE Geo DMG.

Tectonic Tide DMG and Fatal Blossom DMG will not generate Transient Blossoms.
skills.info: Under the Kreideprinz's command, the tectonic tide of creation seethes into life.

passives.name: Calcite Might
passives.description: Transient Blossoms generated by Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma deal 25% more DMG to opponents whose HP is below 50%.

passives.name: Homuncular Nature
passives.description: Using Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide increases the Elemental Mastery of nearby party members by 125 for 10s.

passives.name: Flash of Genius
passives.description: When Albedo crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, he has a 10% chance to receive double the product.

constellations.name: Flower of Eden
constellations.description: Transient Blossoms generated by Albedo's Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma regenerate 1.2 Energy for Albedo.

constellations.name: Opening of Phanerozoic
constellations.description:
Transient Blossoms generated by Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma grant Albedo Fatal Reckoning for 30s:
·Unleashing Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide consumes all stacks of Fatal Reckoning. Each stack of Fatal Reckoning consumed increases the DMG dealt by Fatal Blossoms and Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide's burst DMG by 30% of Albedo's DEF.
·This effect stacks up to 4 times.

constellations.name: Grace of Helios
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Descent of Divinity
constellations.description: Active party members within the Solar Isotoma field have their Plunging Attack DMG increased by 30%.

constellations.name: Tide of Hadean
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Dust of Purification
constellations.description: Active party members within the Solar Isotoma field who are protected by a shield created by Crystallize have their DMG increased by 17%.

name: Amber
title: Gliding Champion
description: Always energetic and full of life, Amber's the best — albeit only — Outrider of the Knights of Favonius.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Sharpshooter
skills.description:
Normal Attack
Perform up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.

Charged Attack
Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG.
While aiming, flames will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged flaming arrow will deal Pyro DMG.

Plunging Attack
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Explosive Puppet
skills.description:
The ever-reliable Baron Bunny takes the stage.

Baron Bunny
·Continuously taunts the enemy, drawing their fire.
·Baron Bunny's HP scales with Amber's Max HP.
·When destroyed or when its timer expires, Baron Bunny explodes, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.

Hold
Adjusts the throwing direction of Baron Bunny.
The longer the button is held, the further the throw.
skills.info: Baron Bunny hails from a storied lineage, but Amber has stopped keeping count since Baron Bunny the 893rd.

skills.name: Fiery Rain
skills.description: Fires off a shower of arrows, dealing continuous AoE Pyro DMG.
skills.info: Amber's passion truly burns hot.

passives.name: Every Arrow Finds Its Target
passives.description: Increases the CRIT Rate of Fiery Rain by 10% and widens its AoE by 30%.

passives.name: Precise Shot
passives.description: Aimed Shot hits on weak points increase ATK by 15% for 10s.

passives.name: Gliding Champion
passives.description:
Decreases gliding Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: One Arrow to Rule Them All
constellations.description: Fires 2 arrows per Aimed Shot. The second arrow deals 20% of the first arrow's DMG.

constellations.name: Bunny Triggered
constellations.description:
Baron Bunny, new and improved! Hitting Baron Bunny's foot with a fully-charged Aimed Shot manually detonates it.
Explosion via manual detonation deals 200% additional DMG.

constellations.name: It Burns!
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Fiery Rain by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: It's Not Just Any Doll...
constellations.description: Decreases Explosive Puppet's CD by 20%. Adds 1 additional charge.

constellations.name: It's Baron Bunny!
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Explosive Puppet by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Wildfire
constellations.description: Fiery Rain increases all party members' Movement SPD by 15% and ATK by 15% for 10s.

name: Barbara
title: Shining Idol
description: Every citizen of Mondstadt adores Barbara. She learned the word "idol" from a magazine.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Whisper of Water
skills.description:
Normal Attack
Perform up to 4 water splash attacks that deal Hydro DMG.

Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal AoE Hydro DMG after a short casting time.

Plunging Attack
Gathering the might of Hydro, Barbara plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Hydro DMG upon impact with the ground.

skills.name: Let the Show Begin♪
skills.description:
Summons water droplets resembling musical notes that form a Melody Loop, dealing Hydro DMG to surrounding opponents and applying the Wet status to them.

Melody Loop
·On hit, Barbara's Normal Attacks heal your own party members and nearby teammates for a certain amount of HP, which scales with Barbara's Max HP.
·On hit, Barbara's Charged Attack generates 4 times the amount of healing.
·Periodically regenerates your own active character's HP.
·Applies the Wet status to the character and to opponents who come in contact with them.
skills.info: Barbara's music is the magic that heals her companions.

skills.name: Shining Miracle♪
skills.description: Heals your own party members and nearby teammates for a large amount of HP that scales with Barbara's Max HP.
skills.info: Barbara's desire to heal strengthens her will to fight and sing.

passives.name: Glorious Season
passives.description: The Stamina Consumption of characters within Let the Show Begin♪'s Melody Loop is reduced by 12%.

passives.name: Encore
passives.description:
When your active character gains an Elemental Orb/Particle, the duration of the Melody Loop of Let the Show Begin♪ is extended by 1s.
The maximum extension is 5s.

passives.name: With My Whole Heart♪
passives.description: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a dish with restorative effects, there is a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

constellations.name: Gleeful Songs
constellations.description: Barbara regenerates 1 Energy every 10s.

constellations.name: Vitality Burst
constellations.description:
Decreases the CD of Let the Show Begin♪ by 15%.
During the ability's duration, your active character gains a 15% Hydro DMG Bonus.

constellations.name: Star of Tomorrow
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Shining Miracle♪ by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Attentiveness be My Power
constellations.description:
Every opponent Barbara hits with her Charged Attack regenerates 1 Energy for her.
A maximum of 5 energy can be regenerated in this manner with any one Charged Attack.

constellations.name: The Purest Companionship
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Let the Show Begin♪ by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Dedicating Everything to You
constellations.description:
When Barbara is in the party but not on the field, and one of your own party members falls:
·Automatically revives the fallen character.
·Fully restores the revived character's HP to 100%.
This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.

name: Beidou
title: Uncrowned Lord of the Ocean
description: Captain of her crew, The Crux. She's quite an unbound and forthright woman.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Oceanborne
skills.description:
Normal Attack
Perform up to 5 consecutive strikes.

Charged Attack
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes.
At end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.

Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Tidecaller
skills.description:
Nothing to worry about. Should anyone raise a hand against her or her men, she will avenge it ten-fold with sword and thunder.

Press
Accumulating the power of lightning, Beidou swings her blade forward fiercely, dealing Electro DMG.

Hold
Lifts her weapon up as a shield. Max DMG absorbed scales off Beidou's Max HP.
Attacks using the energy stored within the greatsword upon release or once this ability's duration expires, dealing Electro DMG. DMG dealt scales with the number of times Beidou is attacked in the skill's duration. The greatest DMG Bonus will be attained once this effect is triggered twice.
The shield possesses the following properties:
·Has 250% Electro DMG Absorption Efficiency.
·Applies the Electro element to Beidou upon activation.
skills.info: Conquer the high seas! Pursue the waves and chase the storm!

skills.name: Stormbreaker
skills.description:
Recalling her slaying of the great beast Haishan, Beidou calls upon that monstrous strength and the lightning to create a Thunderbeast's Targe around herself, dealing Electro DMG to nearby opponents.

Thunderbeast's Targe
·When Normal and Charged Attacks hit, they create a lightning discharge that can jump between opponents, dealing Electro DMG.
·Increases the character's resistance to interruption, and decreases DMG taken.

A maximum of 1 lightning discharge can be triggered per second.
skills.info: With a peal of thunder, Haishan is slain.

passives.name: Retribution
passives.description: Counterattacking with Tidecaller at the precise moment when the character is hit grants the maximum DMG Bonus.

passives.name: Lightning Storm
passives.description:
Gain the following effects for 10s after unleashing Tidecaller with its maximum DMG Bonus:
·DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks is increased by 15%. ATK SPD of Normal and Charged Attacks is increased by 15%.
·Greatly reduced delay before unleashing Charged Attacks.

passives.name: Conqueror of Tides
passives.description:
Decreases swimming Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: Sea Beast's Scourge
constellations.description:
When Stormbreaker is used:
Creates a shield that absorbs up to 16% of Beidou's Max HP for 15s.
This shield absorbs Electro DMG 250% more effectively.

constellations.name: Upon the Turbulent Sea, the Thunder Arises
constellations.description: Stormbreaker's arc lightning can jump to 2 additional targets.

constellations.name: Summoner of Storm
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Tidecaller by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Stunning Revenge
constellations.description: Within 10s of taking DMG, Beidou's Normal Attacks gain 20% additional Electro DMG.

constellations.name: Crimson Tidewalker
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Stormbreaker by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Bane of Evil
constellations.description: During the duration of Stormbreaker, the Electro RES of surrounding opponents is decreased by 15%.

name: Bennett
title: Trial by Fire
description: A good-natured adventurer from Mondstadt who's unfortunately extremely unlucky.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Strike of Fortune
skills.description:
Normal Attack
Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.

Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Passion Overload
skills.description:
Bennett puts all his fire and passion for adventuring into his sword. Results may vary based on how fired up he is...

Press
A single, swift flame strike that deals Pyro DMG.

Hold (Short)
Charges up, resulting in different effects when unleashed based on the Charge Level.
·Level 1: Strikes twice, dealing Pyro DMG and launching opponents.
·Level 2: Unleashes 3 consecutive attacks that deal impressive Pyro DMG, but the last attack triggers an explosion that launches both Bennett and the enemy.
Bennett takes no damage from being launched.
skills.info: An attack that combines Bennett's dreams and passion with Pyro. But passion is sometimes overblown, and Pyro sometimes blows over.

skills.name: Fantastic Voyage
skills.description:
Bennett performs a jumping attack that deals Pyro DMG, creating an Inspiration Field.

Inspiration Field
·If the health of a character within the AoE is equal to or falls below 70%, their health will continuously regenerate. The amount of HP restored scales off Bennett's Max HP.
·If the health of a character within the AoE is higher than 70%, they gain an ATK Bonus that is based on Bennett's Base ATK.
·Imbues characters within the AoE with Pyro.
skills.info: Benny's Adventure Team's adventures are always fraught with unexpected danger. However, Bennett is more inclined to call them "journeys full of wonder, excitement, and beauty."

passives.name: Rekindle
passives.description: Decreases Passion Overload's CD by 20%.

passives.name: Fearnaught
passives.description:
Within the area created by Fantastic Voyage, Passion Overload takes on the following effects:
·CD is reduced by 50%.
·Bennett will not be launched by the effects of Charge Level 2.

passives.name: It Should Be Safe...
passives.description: When dispatched on an expedition in Mondstadt, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

constellations.name: Grand Expectation
constellations.description: Fantastic Voyage's ATK increase no longer has an HP restriction, and gains an additional 20% of Bennett's Base ATK.

constellations.name: Impasse Conqueror
constellations.description: When Bennett's HP falls below 70%, his Energy Recharge is increased by 30%.

constellations.name: Unstoppable Fervor
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Passion Overload by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Unexpected Odyssey
constellations.description:
Using a Normal Attack when executing the second attack of Passion Overload's Charge Level 1 allows an additional attack to be performed.
This additional attack does 135% of the second attack's DMG.

constellations.name: True Explorer
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Fantastic Voyage by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Fire Ventures with Me
constellations.description: Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters inside Fantastic Voyage's radius gain a 15% Pyro DMG Bonus and their weapons are infused with Pyro.

name: Chongyun
title: Frozen Ardor
description: A young exorcist from a family of exorcists. He does everything he can to suppress his abundance of yang energy.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Demonbane
skills.description:
Normal Attack
Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes.

Charged Attack
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents.
At end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.

Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost
skills.description:
Chongyun strikes the ground with his greatsword, causing a Cryo explosion in a circular AoE in front of him that deals Cryo DMG.
After a short delay, the cold air created by the Cryo explosion will coalesce into a Chonghua Frost Field, within which all Sword, Claymore and Polearm-wielding characters' weapons will be infused with Cryo.
skills.info: "A crystal-clear ring, and all is silent. The rivers move not, and the clouds are heavy with frost. The altar gates open, and evil is banished."

skills.name: Spirit Blade: Cloud-Parting Star
skills.description:
Performing the secret hand seals, Chongyun summons 3 giant spirit blades in mid-air that fall to the earth one by one after a short delay, exploding as they hit the ground.
When the spirit blades explode, they will deal AoE Cryo DMG and launch opponents.
skills.info: "As ice doth give the biting frost birth, My transcendent blade shakes heaven and earth. Heed my summons and come hence!"

passives.name: Steady Breathing
passives.description: Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters within the field created by Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost have their Normal ATK SPD increased by 8%.

passives.name: Rimechaser Blade
passives.description: When the field created by Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost disappears, another spirit blade will be summoned to strike nearby opponents, dealing 100% of Chonghua's Layered Frost's Skill DMG as AoE Cryo DMG. Opponents hit by this blade will have their Cryo RES decreased by 10% for 8s.

passives.name: Gallant Journey
passives.description: When dispatched on an expedition in Liyue, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

constellations.name: Ice Unleashed
constellations.description: The last attack of Chongyun's Normal Attack combo releases 3 ice blades. Each blade deals 50% of Chongyun's ATK as Cryo DMG to all opponents in its path.

constellations.name: Atmospheric Revolution
constellations.description: Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts cast within the Frost Field created by Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost have their CD time decreased by 15%.

constellations.name: Cloudburst
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Spirit Blade: Cloud-parting Star by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Frozen Skies
constellations.description:
Chongyun regenerates 1 Energy every time he hits an opponent affected by Cryo.
This effect can only occur once every 2s.

constellations.name: The True Path
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Rally of Four Blades
constellations.description:
Spirit Blade: Cloud-parting Star deals 15% more DMG to opponents with a lower percentage of their Max HP remaining than Chongyun.
This skill will also summon 1 additional spirit blade.

name: Diluc
title: The Dark Side of Dawn
description: The tycoon of a winery empire in Mondstadt, unmatched in every possible way.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Tempered Sword
skills.description:
Normal Attack
Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes.

Charged Attack
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes.
At end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.

Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Searing Onslaught
skills.description:
Performs a forward slash that deals Pyro DMG.

This skill can be used 3 times consecutively. Enters CD if not cast again within a short period.
skills.info: The slashes represent the values that Diluc holds dear: one for justice, one for courage, and one for duty.

skills.name: Dawn
skills.description:
Releases intense flames to knock nearby opponents back, dealing Pyro DMG. The flames then converge into the weapon, summoning a Phoenix that flies forward and deals massive Pyro DMG to all opponents in its path. The Phoenix explodes upon reaching its destination, causing a large amount of AoE Pyro DMG.
The searing flames that run down his blade cause it to be infused with Pyro.
skills.info: The only reason to walk in the darkness is to light it up. Behold, that fleeing light in the dead of night is the herald of the coming dawn.

passives.name: Relentless
passives.description: Diluc's Charged Attack Stamina Cost is decreased by 50%, and its duration is increased by 3s.

passives.name: Blessing of Phoenix
passives.description: The Pyro Infusion provided by Dawn lasts for 4s longer. Additionally, Diluc gains 20% Pyro DMG Bonus during the duration of this effect.

passives.name: Tradition of the Dawn Knight
passives.description: Refunds 15% of the ore used when crafting Claymore-type weapons.

constellations.name: Conviction
constellations.description: Diluc deals 15% more DMG to opponents whose HP is above 50%.

constellations.name: Searing Ember
constellations.description:
When Diluc takes DMG, his ATK increases by 10% and his ATK SPD increases by 5%. Lasts for 10s.
This effect can stack up to 3 times and can only occur once every 1.5s.

constellations.name: Fire and Steel
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Searing Onslaught by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Flowing Flame
constellations.description:
Casting Searing Onslaught in rhythm greatly increases damage dealt.
2s after casting Searing Onslaught, casting the next Searing Onslaught in the combo deals 40% additional DMG. This effect lasts for 2s.

constellations.name: Phoenix, Harbinger of Dawn
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Dawn by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Flaming Sword, Nemesis of the Dark
constellations.description:
After casting Searing Onslaught, the next 2 Normal Attacks within the next 6s will have their DMG and ATK SPD increased by 30%.
Additionally, Searing Onslaught will not interrupt the Normal Attack combo.

name: Diona
title: Kätzlein Cocktail
description: A young lady who has inherited trace amounts of non-human blood. She is the incredibly popular bartender of the Cat's Tail tavern.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Kätzlein Style
skills.description:
Normal Attack
Perform up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.

Charged Attack
Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG.
While aiming, biting frost will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged frost arrow will deal Cryo DMG.

Plunging Attack
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Icy Paws
skills.description:
Fires an Icy Paw that deals Cryo DMG to opponents and forms a shield on hit.
The shield's DMG Absorption scales based on Diona's Max HP, and its duration scales off the number of Icy Paws that hit their target.

Press
Rapidly fires off 2 Icy Paws.

Hold
Dashes back quickly before firing five Icy Paws.
The shield created by a Hold attack will gain a 75% DMG Absorption Bonus.

The shield has a 250% Cryo DMG Absorption Bonus, and will cause your active character to become affected by Cryo at the point of formation for a short duration.
skills.info: When she first started bartending, Diona found that no matter how much ice she put in her cocktails, it would never do a drunkard any harm. That all changed when she received her Vision — now she can form ice cold enough to cause severe brainfreeze. Five out of five stars!

skills.name: Signature Mix
skills.description:
Tosses out a special cold brew that deals AoE Cryo DMG and creates a Drunken Mist in an AoE.

Drunken Mist
·Deals continuous Cryo DMG to opponents within the AoE.
·Continuously regenerates the HP of characters within the AoE.
skills.info: A horrific mix that even Diona considers inhumane. The horrifying foretaste should be left for one's opponents. It has a crisp aftertaste, but unfortunately, one can only feel it on one's nose and skin.

passives.name: Cat's Tail Secret Menu
passives.description: Characters shielded by Icy Paws have their Movement SPD increased by 10% and their Stamina Consumption decreased by 10%.

passives.name: Drunkards' Farce
passives.description: Opponents who enter the AoE of Signature Mix have 10% decreased ATK for 15s.

passives.name: Complimentary Bar Food
passives.description: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a dish with restorative effects, there is a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

constellations.name: A Lingering Flavor
constellations.description: Regenerates 15 Energy for Diona after the effects of Signature Mix end.

constellations.name: Shaken, Not Purred
constellations.description:
Increases Icy Paws' DMG by 15%, and increases its shield's DMG Absorption by 15%.
Additionally, when paws hit their targets, creates a shield for other nearby characters on the field with 50% of the Icy Paws shield's DMG Absorption for 5s.

constellations.name: A—Another Round?
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Signature Mix by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Wine Industry Slayer
constellations.description: Within the radius of Signature Mix, Diona's charge time for aimed shots is reduced by 60%

constellations.name: Double Shot, On The Rocks
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Icy Paws by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Cat's Tail Closing Time
constellations.description:
Characters within Signature Mix's radius will gain the following effects based on their HP amounts:
·Increases Incoming Healing Bonus by 30% when HP falls below or is equal to 50%.
·Elemental Mastery increased by 200 when HP is above 50%.

name: Fischl
title: Prinzessin der Verurteilung!
description: A mysterious girl who calls herself "Prinzessin der Verurteilung" and travels with a night raven named Oz.

cv.japanese: 内田真礼 & 増谷康紀

skills.name: Normal Attack: Bolts of Downfall
skills.description:
Normal Attack
Perform up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.

Charged Attack
Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG.
While aiming, the dark lightning spirits of Immernachtreich shall heed the call of their Prinzessin and indwell the enchanted arrowhead. When fully indwelt, the Rachsüchtig Blitz shall deal immense Electro DMG.

Plunging Attack
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Nightrider
skills.description:
Summons Oz. The night raven forged of darkness and lightning descends upon the land, dealing Electro DMG in a small AoE.
For the ability's duration, Oz will continuously attack nearby opponents with Freikugel.

Hold to adjust the location Oz will be summoned to.
Press again any time during the ability's duration to once again summon him to Fischl's side.
skills.info:
"My time is most precious, and I shall not waste it on the likes of you... Go, Oz, fall upon them, and bring down upon them your Rachsüchtig Blitz, that which tears open the long night."
—Flowers for Princess Fischl (IV): Farewell Frau Welt

skills.name: Midnight Phantasmagoria
skills.description:
Summons Oz to spread his twin wings of twilight and defend Fischl.
Has the following properties during the ability's duration:
·Fischl takes on Oz's form, greatly increasing her Movement Speed.
·Strikes nearby opponents with lightning, dealing Electro DMG to opponents she comes into contact with. Each opponent can only be struck once.
·Once this ability's effects end, Oz will remain on the battlefield and attack his Prinzessin's foes. If Oz is already on the field, then this will reset the duration of his presence.
skills.info:
"...In the hordes of beasts that follow the cursed blood, only Prince Nachtraben, who bore witness to the extinction of a thousand worlds, knows her true greatness. Thus the night wings he spreads are his eternal promise to protect Her Royal Highness."
—Flowers for Princess Fischl (I): End Time Zersetzung

passives.name: Stellar Predator
passives.description: When Fischl hits Oz with a fully-charged Aimed Shot, Oz brings down Thundering Retribution, dealing AoE Electro DMG equal to 152.7% of the arrow's DMG.

passives.name: Undone Be Thy Sinful Hex
passives.description: If your current active character triggers an Electro-related Elemental Reaction when Oz is on the field, the opponent shall be stricken with Thundering Retribution, dealing Electro DMG equal to 80% of Fischl's ATK.

passives.name: Mein Hausgarten
passives.description: When dispatched on an expedition in Mondstadt, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

constellations.name: Gaze of the Deep
constellations.description: Even when Oz is not present in combat, he can still watch over Fischl through his raven eyes. When Fischl performs a Normal Attack against an opponent, Oz fires a joint attack, dealing DMG equal to 22% of Fischl's ATK.

constellations.name: Devourer of All Sins
constellations.description: When Nightrider is used, it deals an additional 200% ATK as DMG, and its AoE is increased by 50%.

constellations.name: Wings of Nightmare
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Nightrider by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Her Pilgrimage of Bleak
constellations.description:
When Midnight Phantasmagoria is used, it deals 222% of ATK as Electro DMG to surrounding opponents.
When the skill duration ends, Fischl regenerates 20% of her HP.

constellations.name: Against the Fleeing Light
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Midnight Phantasmagoria by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Evernight Raven
constellations.description: Extends the duration of Oz's presence on the field by 2s. Additionally, Oz performs joint attacks with your active character when present, dealing 30% of Fischl's ATK as Electro DMG.

name: Ganyu
title: Plenilune Gaze
description: The secretary at Yuehai Pavilion. The blood of the qilin, an illuminated beast, flows within her veins.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Liutian Archery
skills.description:
Normal Attack
Perform up to 6 consecutive shots with a bow.

Charged Attack
Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG.
While aiming, an icy aura will accumulate on the arrowhead before the arrow is fired. Has different effects based on how long the energy has been charged:
·Charge Level 1: Fires off an icy arrow that deals Cryo DMG.
·Charge Level 2: Fires off a Frostflake Arrow that deals Cryo DMG. The Frostflake Arrow blooms after hitting its target, dealing AoE Cryo DMG.

Plunging Attack
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Trail of the Qilin
skills.description:
Leaving a single Ice Lotus behind, Ganyu dashes backward, shunning all impurity and dealing AoE Cryo DMG.

Ice Lotus
·Continuously taunts surrounding opponents, attracting them to attack it.
·Endurance scales based on Ganyu's Max HP.
·Blooms profusely when destroyed or once its duration ends, dealing AoE Cryo DMG.
skills.info: "You saw me, you say? You must be mistaken. I was working overtime then."

skills.name: Celestial Shower
skills.description:
Coalesces atmospheric frost and snow to summon a Sacred Cryo Pearl that exorcises evil.
During its ability duration, the Sacred Cryo Pearl will continuously rain down shards of ice, striking opponents within an AoE and dealing Cryo DMG.
skills.info: Ganyu can bring down sweet rains as a matter of course. But against demons and heretics, they become bitter, freezing snow.

passives.name: Undivided Heart
passives.description: After firing a Frostflake Arrow, the CRIT Rate of subsequent Frostflake Arrows and their resulting bloom effects is increased by 20% for 5s.

passives.name: Harmony between Heaven and Earth
passives.description: Celestial Shower grants a 20% Cryo DMG Bonus to active party members in the AoE.

passives.name: Preserved for the Hunt
passives.description: Refunds 15% of the ore used when crafting Bow-type weapons.

constellations.name: Dew-Drinker
constellations.description:
Taking DMG from a Charge Level 2 Frostflake Arrow or Frostflake Arrow Bloom decreases opponents' Cryo RES by 15% for 6s.
A hit regenerates 2 Energy for Ganyu. This effect can only occur once per Charge Level 2 Frostflake Arrow, regardless if Frostflake Arrow itself or its Bloom hit the target.

constellations.name: The Auspicious
constellations.description: Trail of the Qilin gains 1 additional charge.

constellations.name: Cloud-Strider
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Celestial Shower by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Westward Sojourn
constellations.description:
Opponents standing within the AoE of Celestial Shower take increased DMG. This effect strengthens over time.
Increased DMG taken begins at 5% and increases by 5% every 3s, up to a maximum of 25%.
The effect lingers for 3s after the opponent leaves the AoE.

constellations.name: The Merciful
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Trail of the Qilin by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: The Clement
constellations.description: Using Trail of the Qilin causes the next Frostflake Arrow shot within 30s to not require charging.

name: Hu Tao
title: Fragrance in Thaw
description: The 77th Director of the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. She took over the business at a rather young age.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Secret Spear of Wangsheng
skills.description:
Normal Attack
Performs up to six consecutive spear strikes.

Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way.

Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Guide to Afterlife
skills.description:
Only an unwavering flame can cleanse the impurities of this world.
Hu Tao consumes a set portion of her HP to knock the surrounding enemies back and enter the Paramita Papilio state.

Paramita Papilio
·Increases Hu Tao's ATK based on her Max HP at the time of entering this state. ATK Bonus gained this way cannot exceed 400% of Hu Tao's Base ATK.
·Converts attack DMG to Pyro DMG, which cannot be overridden by any other elemental infusion.
·Charged Attacks apply the Blood Blossom effect to the enemies hit.
·Increases Hu Tao's resistance to interruption.

Blood Blossom
Enemies affected by Blood Blossom will take Pyro DMG every 4s. This DMG is considered Elemental Skill DMG.
Each enemy can be affected by only one Blood Blossom effect at a time, and its duration may only be refreshed by Hu Tao herself.

Paramita Papilio ends when its duration is over, or Hu Tao has left the battlefield or fallen.
skills.info: Hu Tao's Secret Spear technique is based on several rules, the first of which is: "The spear opens the path to the afterlife, and the butterflies bridge this world and the next."

skills.name: Spirit Soother
skills.description:
Commands a blazing spirit to attack, dealing Pyro DMG in a large AoE.
Upon striking the enemy, regenerates a percentage of Hu Tao's Max HP. This effect can be triggered up to 5 times, based on the number of enemies hit.
If Hu Tao's HP is below or equal to 50% when the enemy is hit, both the DMG and HP Regeneration are increased.
skills.info: Supernatural activity by those who have already left this world is a source of great anxiety for the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. In such cases, cremation always lets Hu Tao find peace of mind. The more anxious she feels, the stronger the flame.

passives.name: Flutter By
passives.description: When a Paramita Papilio state activated by Guide to Afterlife ends, all allies in the party (excluding Hu Tao herself) will have their CRIT Rate increased by 12% for 8s.

passives.name: Sanguine Rouge
passives.description: When Hu Tao's HP is equal to or less than 50%, her Pyro DMG Bonus is increased by 33%.

passives.name: The More the Merrier
passives.description: When Hu Tao cooks a dish perfectly, she has a 18% chance to receive an additional "Suspicious" dish of the same type.

constellations.name: Crimson Bouquet
constellations.description: While in a Paramita Papilio state activated by Guide to Afterlife, Hu Tao's Charge Attacks do not consume Stamina.

constellations.name: Ominous Rainfall
constellations.description:
Increases the Blood Blossom DMG by an amount equal to 10% of Hu Tao's Max HP at the time the effect is applied.
Additionally, Spirit Soother will also apply the Blood Blossom effect.

constellations.name: Lingering Carmine
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Guide to Afterlife by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Garden of Eternal Rest
constellations.description: Upon defeating an enemy affected by a Blood Blossom that Hu Tao applied herself, all nearby allies in the party (excluding Hu Tao herself) will have their CRIT Rate increased by 12% for 15s.

constellations.name: Floral Incense
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Spirit Soother by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Butterfly's Embrace
constellations.description:
Triggers when Hu Tao's HP drops below 25%, or when she suffers a lethal strike:
Hu Tao will not fall as a result of the DMG sustained. Additionally, for the next 10s, all of her Elemental and Physical RES is increased by 200%, her CRIT Rate is increased by 100%, and her resistance to interruption is greatly increased.
This effect triggers automatically when Hu Tao has 1 HP left.
Can only occur once every 60s.

name: Jean
title: Dandelion Knight
description: The righteous and rigorous Dandelion Knight, and Acting Grand Master of Mondstadt's Knights of Favonius.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Favonius Bladework
skills.description:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 5 consecutive strikes.

Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of stamina to launch an opponent using the power of wind.
Launched opponents will slowly fall to the ground.

Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Gale Blade
skills.description:
Focusing the might of the formless wind around her blade, Jean releases a miniature storm, launching opponents in the direction she aims at, dealing massive Anemo DMG.

Hold
At the cost of continued stamina consumption, Jean can command the whirlwind to pull surrounding opponents and objects towards her front.
Direction can be adjusted.
Character is immobile during skill duration.
skills.info: That which follows Jean, the wholehearted defender, is a guardian wind that can banish danger from her comrades' presence.

skills.name: Dandelion Breeze
skills.description:
Calling upon the wind's protection, Jean creates a swirling Dandelion Field, launching surrounding opponents and dealing Anemo DMG.
At the same time, she instantly regenerates a large amount of HP for all party members. The amount of HP restored scales off Jean's ATK.

Dandelion Field
·Continuously regenerates HP of characters within the AoE and continuously imbues them with Anemo.
·Deals Anemo DMG to opponents entering or exiting the Dandelion Field.
skills.info: Jean's magnanimity is as vast as the dandelion fields, and it is the root of her wish to protect others.

passives.name: Wind Companion
passives.description: On hit, Jean's Normal Attacks have a 50% chance to regenerate HP equal to 15% of Jean's ATK for all party members.

passives.name: Let the Wind Lead
passives.description: Using Dandelion Breeze will regenerate 20% of its Energy.

passives.name: Guiding Breeze
passives.description: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a dish with restorative effects, there is a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

constellations.name: Spiraling Tempest
constellations.description: Increases the pulling speed of Gale Blade after holding for more than 1s, and increases the DMG dealt by 40%.

constellations.name: People's Aegis
constellations.description: When Jean picks up an Elemental Orb/Particle, all party members have their Movement SPD and ATK SPD increased by 15% for 15s.

constellations.name: When the West Wind Arises
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Dandelion Breeze by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Lands of Dandelion
constellations.description: Within the Field created by Dandelion Breeze, all opponents have their Anemo RES decreased by 40%.

constellations.name: Outbursting Gust
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Gale Blade by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Lion's Fang, Fair Protector of Mondstadt
constellations.description: Incoming DMG is decreased by 35% within the Field created by Dandelion Breeze. Upon leaving the Dandelion Field, this effect lasts for 3 attacks or 10s.

name: Kaeya
title: Frostwind Swordsman
description: A thinker in the Knights of Favonius with a somewhat exotic appearance.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Ceremonial Bladework
skills.description:
Normal Attack
Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.

Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Frostgnaw
skills.description: Unleashes a frigid blast, dealing Cryo DMG to opponents in front of Kaeya.
skills.info: Kaeya seems affable, but his nature is that of unyielding ice.

skills.name: Glacial Waltz
skills.description:
Coalescing the frost in the air, Kaeya summons 3 icicles that revolve around him.
These icicles will follow the character around and deal Cryo DMG to opponents in their path for the ability's duration.
skills.info: A winsome smile, genial words, and the merciless hoarfrost that lies beneath... These are all Kaeya's weapons.

passives.name: Cold-Blooded Strike
passives.description: Every hit with Frostgnaw regenerates HP for Kaeya equal to 15% of his ATK.

passives.name: Glacial Heart
passives.description:
Opponents Frozen by Frostgnaw will drop additional Elemental Particles.
Frostgnaw may only produce a maximum of 2 additional Elemental Particles per use.

passives.name: Hidden Strength
passives.description:
Decreases sprinting Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: Excellent Blood
constellations.description: The CRIT Rate of Kaeya's Normal and Charge Attacks against opponents affected by Cryo is increased by 15%.

constellations.name: Never-Ending Performance
constellations.description: Every time Glacial Waltz defeats an opponent during its duration, its duration is increased by 2.5s, up to a maximum of 15s.

constellations.name: Dance of Frost
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Frostgnaw by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Frozen Kiss
constellations.description:
Triggers automatically when Kaeya's HP falls below 20%:
Creates a shield that absorbs damage equal to 30% of Kaeya's Max HP. Lasts for 20s.
This shield absorbs Cryo DMG with 250% efficiency.
Can only occur once every 60s.

constellations.name: Frostbiting Embrace
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Glacial Waltz by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Glacial Whirlwind
constellations.description: Glacial Waltz will generate 1 additional icicle, and will regenerate 15 Energy when cast.

name: Keqing
title: Driving Thunder
description: The Yuheng of the Liyue Qixing. Keqing has much to say about Rex Lapis' unilateral approach to policymaking in Liyue — but in truth, gods admire skeptics such as her quite a lot.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Yunlai Swordsmanship
skills.description:
Normal Attack
Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.

Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Stellar Restoration
skills.description:
Hurls a Lightning Stiletto that annihilates her opponents like the swift thunder.
When the Stiletto hits its target, it deals Electro DMG to opponents in a small AoE, and places a Stiletto Mark on the spot hit.

Hold
Hold to adjust the direction in which the Stiletto shall be thrown.
Stilettos thrown by the Hold attack mode can be suspended in mid-air, allowing Keqing to jump to them when using Stellar Restoration a second time.

Lightning Stiletto
If Keqing uses Stellar Restoration again or uses a Charged Attack while its duration lasts, it will clear the Stiletto Mark and produce different effects:
·If she uses Stellar Restoration again, she will blink to the location of the Mark and unleash one slashing attack that deals AoE Electro DMG. When blinking to a Stiletto that was thrown from a Holding attack, Keqing can leap across obstructing terrain.
·If Keqing uses a Charged Attack, she will ignite a series of thundering cuts at the Mark's location, dealing AoE Electro DMG.
skills.info: "Humans are like moths, endlessly chasing the flame we call gods and adepti. But this light that I have here is my own."

skills.name: Starward Sword
skills.description:
Keqing unleashes the power of lightning, dealing Electro DMG in an AOE.
She then blends into the shadow of her blade, striking a series of thunderclap-blows to nearby opponents simultaneously that deal multiple instances of Electro DMG. The final attack deals massive AoE Electro DMG.
skills.info: The swiftest technique in Keqing's personal arsenal is fast enough to bring stars crashing down.

passives.name: Thundering Penance
passives.description: After recasting Stellar Restoration while a Lightning Stiletto is present, Keqing's weapon gains an Electro Infusion for 5s.

passives.name: Aristocratic Dignity
passives.description: When casting Starward Sword, Keqing's CRIT Rate is increased by 15%, and her Energy Recharge is increased by 15%. This effect lasts for 8s.

passives.name: Land's Overseer
passives.description: When dispatched on an expedition in Liyue, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

constellations.name: Thundering Might
constellations.description: Recasting Stellar Restoration while a Lightning Stiletto is present causes Keqing to deal 50% of her ATK as AoE Electro DMG at the start point and terminus of her Blink.

constellations.name: Keen Extraction
constellations.description:
When Keqing's Normal and Charged Attacks hit opponents affected by Electro, they have a 50% chance of producing an Elemental Particle.
This effect can only occur once every 5s.

constellations.name: Foreseen Reformation
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Starward Sword by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Attunement
constellations.description: For 10s after Keqing triggers an Electro-related Elemental Reaction, her ATK is increased by 25%.

constellations.name: Beckoning Stars
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Stellar Restoration by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Tenacious Star
constellations.description:
When initiating a Normal Attack, a Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst, Keqing gains a 6% Electro DMG Bonus for 8s.
Effects triggered by Normal Attacks, Charged Attacks, Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts are considered independent entities.

name: Klee
title: Fleeing Sunlight
description: An explosives expert and a regular at the Knights of Favonius' confinement room. Also known as Fleeing Sunlight.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Kaboom!
skills.description:
Normal Attack
Throws things that go boom when they hit things! Perform up to 3 explosive attacks, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.

Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and deals AoE Pyro DMG to opponents after a short casting time.

Plunging Attack
Gathering the power of Pyro, Klee plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Pyro DMG upon impact with the ground.

skills.name: Jumpy Dumpty
skills.description:
Jumpy Dumpty is tons of boom-bang-fun!
When thrown, Jumpy Dumpty bounces thrice, igniting and dealing AoE Pyro DMG with every bounce.

On the third bounce, the bomb splits into many mines.
The mines will explode upon contact with opponents, or after a short period of time, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.

Starts with 2 charges.
skills.info: Jumpy Dumpty is Klee's good friend! She can't help but introduce him to everyone.

skills.name: Sparks 'n' Splash
skills.description: Klee's Blazing Delight! For the duration of this ability, continuously summons Sparks 'n' Splash to attack nearby opponents, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.
skills.info: The knights all believe that Klee must have a lucky star watching over her to have never been hurt by any of her own bombs...

passives.name: Pounding Surprise
passives.description:
When Jumpy Dumpty and Normal Attacks deal DMG, Klee has a 50% chance to obtain an Explosive Spark.
This Explosive Spark is consumed by the next Charged Attack, which costs no Stamina and deals 50% increased DMG.

passives.name: Sparkling Burst
passives.description: When Klee's Charged Attack results in a CRIT Hit, all party members gain 2 Elemental Energy.

passives.name: All Of My Treasures!
passives.description: Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Mondstadt on the mini-map.

constellations.name: Chained Reactions
constellations.description: Attacks and Skills have a certain chance to summon sparks that bombard opponents, dealing DMG equal to 120% of Sparks 'n' Splash's DMG.

constellations.name: Explosive Frags
constellations.description: Being hit by Jumpy Dumpty's mines decreases opponents' DEF by 23% for 10s.

constellations.name: Exquisite Compound
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Jumpy Dumpty by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Sparkly Explosion
constellations.description: If Klee leaves the field during the duration of Sparks 'n' Splash, her departure triggers an explosion that deals 555% of her ATK as AoE Pyro DMG.

constellations.name: Nova Burst
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Sparks 'n' Splash by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Blazing Delight
constellations.description:
While under the effects of Sparks 'n' Splash, Klee will regenerate 3 Energy for all members of the party (excluding Klee) every 3s.
When Sparks 'n' Splash is used, all party members will gain a 10% Pyro DMG Bonus for 25s.

name: Lisa
title: Witch of Purple Rose
description: The languid but knowledgeable Librarian of the Knights of Favonius, deemed by Sumeru Academia to be their most distinguished graduate in the past two centuries.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Lightning Touch
skills.description:
Normal Attack
Perform up to 4 lightning attacks that deal Electro DMG.

Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal AoE Electro DMG after a short casting time.

Plunging Attack
Gathering the might of Electro, Lisa plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Electro DMG upon impact with the ground.

skills.name: Violet Arc
skills.description:
Channels the power of lightning to sweep bothersome matters away.

Press
Releases a homing Lightning Orb.
On hit, it deals Electro DMG, and applies a stack of the Conductive status (Max 3 stacks) to opponents in a small AoE.

Hold
After an extended casting time, calls down lightning from the heavens, dealing massive Electro DMG to all nearby opponents.
Deals great amounts of extra damage to opponents based on the number of Conductive stacks applied to them, and clears their Conductive status.
skills.info: Electro Purple is the raiment of the Witch of Purple Rose.

skills.name: Lightning Rose
skills.description:
Summons a Lightning Rose that unleashes powerful lightning bolts, launching surrounding opponents and dealing Electro DMG.
The Lightning Rose will continuously emit lightning to knock back opponents and deal Electro DMG throughout the ability's duration.
skills.info: This rose is beautiful, but beware its mortal thorns.

passives.name: Induced Aftershock
passives.description: Hits by Charged Attacks apply Violet Arc's Conductive status to opponents.

passives.name: Static Electricity Field
passives.description: Opponents hit by Lightning Rose have their DEF decreased by 15% for 10s.

passives.name: General Pharmaceutics
passives.description: When Lisa crafts a potion, she has a 20% chance to refund a portion of the crafting materials used.

constellations.name: Infinite Circuit
constellations.description:
Lisa regenerates 2 Energy for every opponent hit while holding Violet Arc.
A maximum of 10 Energy can be regenerated in this manner at any one time.

constellations.name: Electromagnetic Field
constellations.description:
Holding Violet Arc has the following effects:
·Increases DEF by 25%.
·Increases Lisa's resistance to interruption.

constellations.name: Resonant Thunder
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Lightning Rose by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Plasma Eruption
constellations.description: Increases the number of lightning bolts released by Lightning Rose by 1-3.

constellations.name: Electrocute
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Violet Arc by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Pulsating Witch
constellations.description:
When Lisa takes the field, she applies 3 stacks of Violet Arc's Conductive status onto nearby opponents.
This effect can only occur once every 5s.

name: Mona
title: Astral Reflection
description: A mysterious young astrologer who proclaims herself to be "Astrologist Mona Megistus," and who possesses abilities to match the title. Erudite, but prideful.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Ripple of Fate
skills.description:
Normal Attack
Perform up to 4 water splash attacks that deal Hydro DMG.

Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal AoE Hydro DMG after a short casting time.

Plunging Attack
Gathering the might of Hydro, Mona plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Hydro DMG upon impact with the ground.

skills.name: Mirror Reflection of Doom
skills.description:
Creates an illusory Phantom of Fate from coalesced waterspouts.

The Phantom has the following special properties:
·Continuously taunts nearby opponents, attracting their fire.
·Continuously deals Hydro DMG to nearby opponents.
·When its duration expires, the Phantom explodes, dealing AoE Hydro DMG.

Hold
Utilizes water currents to move backwards swiftly before conjuring a Phantom.

Only one Phantom created by Mirror Reflection of Doom can exist at any time.
skills.info: Skilled astrologers have always dreamed of using a phantom facsimile of themselves to ward off imminent ill fate, but Mona must be the first to make such a mockery of it in all of Teyvat.

skills.name: Illusory Torrent
skills.description:
Alternate Sprint
Mona cloaks herself within the water's flow, consuming Stamina to move rapidly.

When under the effect of Illusory Torrent, Mona can move at high speed on water.
Applies the Wet status to nearby opponents when she reappears.
skills.info: This is something that Mona can do, but her teacher cannot. Well, but it's not as if her teacher would pursue any matter concerning Hydro Visions anyway...

skills.name: Stellaris Phantasm
skills.description:
Mona summons the sparkling waves and creates a reflection of the starry sky, applying the Illusory Bubble status to opponents in a large AoE.

Illusory Bubble
Traps opponents inside a pocket of destiny and also makes them Wet. Renders weaker opponents immobile.
When an opponent affected by Illusory Bubble sustains DMG, it has the following effects:
·Applies an Omen to the opponent, which gives a DMG Bonus, also increasing the DMG of the attack that causes it.
·Removes the Illusory Bubble, dealing Hydro DMG in the process.

Omen
During its duration, increases DMG taken by opponents.
skills.info: It was from the time that gods first traced the lights in the heavens with their eyes that the notion of "fate" was born.

passives.name: "Come 'n' Get Me, Hag!"
passives.description:
After she has used Illusory Torrent for 2s, if there are any opponents nearby, Mona will automatically create a Phantom.
A Phantom created in this manner lasts for 2s, and its explosion DMG is equal to 50% of Mirror Reflection of Doom.

passives.name: Waterborne Destiny
passives.description: Increases Mona's Hydro DMG Bonus by a degree equivalent to 20% of her Energy Recharge rate.

passives.name: Principium of Astrology
passives.description: When Mona crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, she has a 25% chance to refund a portion of the crafting materials used.

constellations.name: Prophecy of Submersion
constellations.description:
When any of your own party members hits an opponent affected by an Omen, the effects of Hydro-related Elemental Reactions are enhanced for 8s:
·Electro-Charged DMG increases by 15%.
·Vaporize DMG increases by 15%.
·Hydro Swirl DMG increases by 15%.
·Frozen duration is extended by 15%.

constellations.name: Lunar Chain
constellations.description:
When a Normal Attack hits, there is a 20% chance that it will be automatically followed by a Charged Attack.
This effect can only occur once every 5s.

constellations.name: Restless Revolution
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Stellaris Phantasm by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Prophecy of Oblivion
constellations.description: When any party member attacks an opponent affected by an Omen, their CRIT Rate is increased by 15%.

constellations.name: Mockery of Fortuna
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Mirror Reflection of Doom by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Rhetorics of Calamitas
constellations.description:
Upon entering Illusory Torrent, Mona gains a 60% increase to the DMG of her next Charged Attack per second of movement.
A maximum DMG Bonus of 180% can be achieved in this manner. The effect lasts for no more than 8s.

name: Ningguang
title: Eclipsing Star
description: The Tianquan of the Liyue Qixing. Her wealth is unsurpassed in all of Teyvat.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Sparkling Scatter
skills.description:
Normal Attack
Shoots gems that deal Geo DMG.
Upon hit, this grants Ningguang 1 Star Jade.

Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of stamina to fire off a giant gem that deals Geo DMG.
If Ningguang has any Star Jades, unleashing a Charged Attack will cause the Star Jades to be fired at the enemy as well, dealing additional DMG.

Plunging Attack
Gathering the might of Geo, Ningguang plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Geo DMG upon impact with the ground.

skills.name: Jade Screen
skills.description:
Ningguang creates a Jade Screen out of gold, obsidian and her great opulence, dealing AoE Geo DMG.

Jade Screen
·Blocks opponents' projectiles.
·Endurance scales based on Ningguang's Max HP.

Jade Screen is considered a Geo Construct and can be used to block certain attacks, but cannot be climbed. Only one Jade Screen may exist at any one time.
skills.info: The canvas of stars is written upon this jade screen.

skills.name: Starshatter
skills.description:
Gathering a great number of gems, Ningguang scatters them all at once, sending homing projectiles at her opponents that deal massive Geo DMG.
If Starshatter is cast when a Jade Screen is nearby, the Jade Screen will fire additional gem projectiles at the same time.
skills.info: Stars shatter. Silence falls.

passives.name: Backup Plan
passives.description: When Ningguang is in possession of Star Jades, her Charged Attack does not consume Stamina.

passives.name: Strategic Reserve
passives.description: A character that passes through the Jade Screen will gain a 12% Geo DMG Bonus for 10s.

passives.name: Trove of Marvelous Treasures
passives.description: Displays the location of nearby ore veins (Iron Ore, White Iron Ore, Crystal Ore, Magical Crystal Ore, and Starsilver) on the mini-map.

constellations.name: Piercing Fragments
constellations.description: When a Normal Attack hits, it deals AoE DMG.

constellations.name: Shock Effect
constellations.description:
When Jade Screen is shattered, its CD will reset.
Can occur once every 6s.

constellations.name: Majesty be the Array of Stars
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Starshatter by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Exquisite be the Jade, Outshining All Beneath
constellations.description: Jade Screen increases nearby characters' Elemental RES by 10%.

constellations.name: Invincible be the Jade Screen
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Jade Screen by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Grandeur be the Seven Stars
constellations.description: When Starshatter is used, Ningguang gains 7 Star Jades.

name: Noelle
title: Chivalric Blossom
description: A maid who faithfully serves the Knights of Favonius. She dreams of joining their ranks someday.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Favonius Bladework - Maid
skills.description:
Normal Attack
Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes.

Charged Attack
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents.
At end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.

Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Breastplate
skills.description:
Summons protective stone armor, dealing Geo DMG to surrounding opponents and creating a shield. The shield's DMG Absorption scales based on Noelle's DEF.
The shield has the following properties:
·When Noelle's Normal and Charged Attacks hit a target, they have a certain chance to regenerate HP for all characters.
·Possesses 150% DMG Absorption efficiency against all Elemental and Physical DMG.

The amount of HP healed when regeneration is triggered scales based on Noelle's DEF.
skills.info: Noelle is both a dutiful maid and a valiant knight.

skills.name: Sweeping Time
skills.description:
Gathering the strength of stone around her weapon, Noelle strikes the opponents surrounding her within a large AoE, dealing Geo DMG.
Afterwards, Noelle gains the following effects:
·Larger attack AoE.
·Converts attack DMG to Geo DMG that cannot be overridden by any other elemental infusion.
·Increased ATK that scales based on her DEF.
skills.info: Sometimes, it's not just dust that needs sweeping...

passives.name: Devotion
passives.description:
When Noelle is in the party but not on the field, this ability triggers automatically when your active character's HP falls below 30%:
Creates a shield for your active character that lasts for 20s and absorbs DMG equal to 400% of Noelle's DEF.
The shield has a 150% DMG Absorption effectiveness against all Elemental and Physical DMG.
This effect can only occur once every 60s.

passives.name: Nice and Clean
passives.description:
Every 4 Normal or Charged Attack hits will decrease the CD of Breastplate by 1s.
Hitting multiple opponents with a single attack is only counted as 1 hit.

passives.name: Maid's Knighthood
passives.description: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a DEF-boosting dish, Noelle has a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

constellations.name: I Got Your Back
constellations.description: While Sweeping Time and Breastplate are both in effect, the chance of Breastplate's healing effects activating is increased to 100%.

constellations.name: Combat Maid
constellations.description: Decreases the Stamina Consumption of Noelle's Charged Attacks by 20% and increases her Charged Attack DMG by 15%.

constellations.name: Invulnerable Maid
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Breastplate by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: To Be Cleaned
constellations.description: When Breastplate's duration expires or it is destroyed by DMG, it will deal 400% ATK of Geo DMG to surrounding opponents.

constellations.name: Favonius Sweeper Master
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Sweeping Time by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Must Be Spotless
constellations.description:
Sweeping Time increases Noelle's ATK by an additional 50% of her DEF.
Additionally, every opponent defeated during the skill's duration adds 1s to the duration, up to 10s.

name: Qiqi
title: Icy Resurrection
description: An apprentice and herb gatherer at Bubu Pharmacy. An undead with a bone-white complexion, she seldom has much in the way of words or emotion.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Ancient Sword Art
skills.description:
Normal Attack
Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.

Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost
skills.description:
Using the Icevein Talisman, Qiqi brings forth the Herald of Frost, dealing Cryo DMG to surrounding opponents.

Herald of Frost
·On hit, Qiqi's Normal and Charged Attacks regenerate HP for your own party members and nearby teammates. Healing scales based on Qiqi's ATK.
·Periodically regenerates your active character's HP.
·Follows the character around, dealing Cryo DMG to opponents in their path.
skills.info: I use this to prevent warming and rot... of Dr. Bai's precious ingredients. Yes.

skills.name: Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune
skills.description:
Qiqi releases the adeptus power sealed within her body, marking nearby opponents with a Fortune-Preserving Talisman that deals Cryo DMG.

Fortune-Preserving Talisman
When opponents affected by this Talisman take DMG, the character that dealt this DMG regenerates HP.
skills.info:
"I am the Fortune Preserver, the Maiden of Resurrection."
— Qiqi does not remember these words.

passives.name: Life-Prolonging Methods
passives.description: When a character under the effects of Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost triggers an Elemental Reaction, their Incoming Healing Bonus is increased by 20% for 8s.

passives.name: A Glimpse into Arcanum
passives.description: When Qiqi hits opponents with her Normal and Charged Attacks, she has a 50% chance to apply a Fortune-Preserving Talisman to them for 6s. This effect can only occur once every 30s.

passives.name: Former Life Memories
passives.description: Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Liyue on the mini-map.

constellations.name: Ascetics of Frost
constellations.description: When the Herald of Frost hits an opponent marked by a Fortune-Preserving Talisman, Qiqi regenerates 2 Energy.

constellations.name: Frozen to the Bone
constellations.description: Qiqi's Normal and Charge Attack DMG against opponents affected by Cryo is increased by 15%.

constellations.name: Ascendant Praise
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Divine Suppression
constellations.description: Targets marked by the Fortune-Preserving Talisman have their ATK decreased by 20%.

constellations.name: Crimson Lotus Bloom
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Rite of Resurrection
constellations.description:
Using Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune revives all fallen party members nearby and regenerates 50% of their HP.
This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.

name: Razor
title: Wolf Boy
description: A boy who lives among the wolves in Wolvendom of Mondstadt, away from human civilization. As agile as lightning.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Steel Fang
skills.description:
Normal Attack
Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes.

Charged Attack
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents.
At end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.

Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Claw and Thunder
skills.description:
Hunts his prey using the techniques taught to him by his master and his Lupical.

Press
Swings the Thunder Wolf Claw, dealing Electro DMG to opponents in front of Razor.
Upon striking an opponent, Razor will gain an Electro Sigil, which increases his Energy Recharge rate.
Razor can have up to 3 Electro Sigils simultaneously, and gaining a new Electro Sigil refreshes their duration.

Hold
Gathers Electro energy to unleash a lightning storm over a small AoE, causing massive Electro DMG, and clears all of Razor's Electro Sigils.
Each Electro Sigil cleared in this manner will be converted into Energy for Razor.
skills.info: In the moment when lightning strikes, you can sometimes glimpse the look of a predator sizing up his prey deep within Razor's eyes.

skills.name: Lightning Fang
skills.description:
Summons the Wolf Within which deals Electro DMG to all nearby opponents. This clears all of Razor's Electro Sigils, which will be converted into elemental energy for him.
The Wolf Within will fight alongside Razor for the skill's duration.

The Wolf Within
·Strikes alongside Razor's normal attacks, dealing Electro DMG.
·Raises Razor's ATK SPD and Electro RES.
·Causes Razor to be immune to DMG inflicted by the Electro-Charged status.
·Disables Razor's Charged Attacks.
·Increases Razor's resistance to interruption.

These effects end when Razor leaves the battlefield.
When Razor leaves the field, a maximum of 10 Energy will be returned to him based off the duration remaining on this skill.
skills.info: The wolf has awoken. The hunt is on.

passives.name: Awakening
passives.description:
Decreases Claw and Thunder's CD by 18%.
Using Lightning Fang resets the CD of Claw and Thunder.

passives.name: Hunger
passives.description: When Razor's Energy is below 50%, increases Energy Recharge by 30%.

passives.name: Wolvensprint
passives.description:
Decreases sprinting Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: Wolf's Instinct
constellations.description: Picking up an Elemental Orb or Particle increases Razor's DMG by 10% for 8s.

constellations.name: Suppression
constellations.description: Increases CRIT Rate against opponents with less than 30% HP by 10%.

constellations.name: Soul Companion
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Lightning Fang by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Bite
constellations.description: When casting Claw and Thunder (Press), opponents hit will have their DEF decreased by 15% for 7s.

constellations.name: Sharpened Claws
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Claw and Thunder by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Lupus Fulguris
constellations.description:
Every 10s, Razor's sword charges up, causing the next Normal Attack to release lightning that deals 100% of Razor's ATK as Electro DMG.
When Razor is not using Lightning Fang, a lightning strike on an opponent will grant Razor an Electro Sigil for Claw and Thunder.

name: Rosaria
title: Thorny Benevolence
description: A sister of the church, though you wouldn't know it if it weren't for her attire. Known for her sharp, cold words and manner, she often works alone.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Spear of the Church
skills.description:
Normal Attack
Performs up to five consecutive spear strikes.

Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way.

Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Ravaging Confession
skills.description:
Rosaria swiftly shifts her position to appear behind her opponent, then stabs and slashes them with her polearm, dealing Cryo DMG.
This ability cannot be used to travel behind opponents of a larger build.
skills.info: Those who confess to Sister Rosaria will be granted no absolution. All sinners shall be met with the piercing cold of punishment proportionate to the weight of their sins.

skills.name: Rites of Termination
skills.description:
Rosaria's unique take on this prayer ritual: First, she swings her weapon to slash surrounding opponents; then, she summons a frigid Ice Lance that strikes the ground. Both actions deal Cryo DMG.
While active, the Ice Lance periodically releases a blast of cold air, dealing Cryo DMG to surrounding opponents.
skills.info: Judgment is such a tedious ordeal — much easier to skip that phase and get straight to the last rites. Rosaria was never very devoted to the Anemo God anyway, which makes performing them all too easy.

passives.name: Regina Probationum
passives.description: When Rosaria strikes an opponent from behind using Ravaging Confession, Rosaria's CRIT Rate increases by 12% for 5s.

passives.name: Shadow Samaritan
passives.description:
Casting Rites of Termination increases CRIT Rate of all nearby party members (except Rosaria herself) by 15% of Rosaria's CRIT Rate for 10s.
CRIT Rate Bonus gained this way cannot exceed 15%.

passives.name: Night Walk
passives.description:
At night (18:00–6:00), increases the Movement SPD of your own party members by 10%.
Does not take effect in Domains, Trounce Domains, or Spiral Abyss. Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: Unholy Revelation
constellations.description: When Rosaria deals a CRIT Hit, her ATK SPD increases by 10% and her Normal Attack DMG increases by 10% for 4s.

constellations.name: Land Without Promise
constellations.description: The duration of the Ice Lance created by Rites of Termination is increased by 4s.

constellations.name: The Wages of Sin
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Ravaging Confession by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Painful Grace
constellations.description:
Ravaging Confession's CRIT Hits regenerate 5 Energy for Rosaria.
Can only be triggered once each time Ravaging Confession is cast.

constellations.name: Last Rites
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Rites of Termination by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Divine Retribution
constellations.description: Rites of Termination's attack decreases opponents' Physical RES by 20% for 10s.

name: Sucrose
title: Harmless Sweetie
description: An alchemist filled with curiosity about all things. She researches bio-alchemy.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Wind Spirit Creation
skills.description:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 4 attacks using Wind Spirits, dealing Anemo DMG.

Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and deals AoE Anemo DMG after a short casting time.

Plunging Attack
Calling upon the power of her Wind Spirits, Sucrose plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Anemo DMG upon impact with the ground.

skills.name: Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308
skills.description: Creates a small Wind Spirit that pulls opponents and objects towards its location, launches opponents within its AoE, and deals Anemo DMG.
skills.info: This is a little embarrassing, but though the elemental lifeforms birthed through this procedure dissipate very rapidly, they are incredibly useful when adventuring. Even failed experiments can have practical applications.

skills.name: Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II
skills.description:
Sucrose hurls an unstable concoction that creates a Large Wind Spirit.
While it persists, the Large Wind Spirit will continuously pull in surrounding opponents and objects, launch nearby opponents, and deal Anemo DMG.

Elemental Absorption
If the Wind Spirit comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro energy, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type.
Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.
skills.info: Sucrose used to give names to her volatile Anemo Hypostases, but their line of heirs quickly grew to surpass Baron Bunny the 893rd.

passives.name: Catalyst Conversion
passives.description: When Sucrose triggers a Swirl reaction, all characters in the party with the matching element (excluding Sucrose) have their Elemental Mastery increased by 50 for 8s.

passives.name: Mollis Favonius
passives.description: When Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 or Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II hits an opponent, increases all party members' (excluding Sucrose) Elemental Mastery by an amount equal to 20% of Sucrose's Elemental Mastery for 8s.

passives.name: Astable Invention
passives.description: When Sucrose crafts Character and Weapon Enhancement Materials, she has a 10% to obtain double the product.

constellations.name: Clustered Vacuum Field
constellations.description: Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 gains 1 additional charge.

constellations.name: Beth: Unbound Form
constellations.description: The duration of Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II is increased by 2s.

constellations.name: Flawless Alchemistress
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Alchemania
constellations.description: Every 7 Normal and Charged Attacks, Sucrose will reduce the CD of Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 by 1-7s.

constellations.name: Caution: Standard Flask
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Chaotic Entropy
constellations.description: If Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II triggers an Elemental Absorption, all party members gain a 20% Elemental DMG Bonus for the corresponding absorbed element during its duration.

name: Tartaglia
title: Childe
description: No. 11 of The Harbingers, also known as "Childe." His name is highly feared on the battlefield.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Cutting Torrent
skills.description:
Normal Attack
Perform up to 6 consecutive shots with a bow.

Charged Attack
Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG.
While aiming, the power of Hydro will accumulate on the arrowhead. A arrow fully charged with the torrent will deal Hydro DMG and apply the Riptide status.

Riptide
Opponents affected by Riptide will suffer from AoE Hydro DMG effects when attacked by Tartaglia in various ways. DMG dealt in this way is considered Normal Attack DMG.
